name: Custom Blog Design
description:
Are you looking for a new design for you blog? This option gives you a fully customised one of a kind design to showcase your blog. 

If you have any colour themes or ideas that you would like featured then please send me an email and I can make those come to life! 

I will always send you a few options for you to choose to make sure that your design is perfect for you. 

This option includes 

A customised header and toolbar 
Social media icons 
Customised fonts and headers 
Customised background 
Post signature 

This option will also include me installing the design for you, for this you will need to send me your blogger log in details. I will always ensure that I inform you of when I will be taking your blog off line to install. 

If you have any other questions please let me know!

name: Blog Header Image only
description:
I can create a customised Header for your blog. this can have page links included if you require. 

I can match this with your current theme or I can create a new theme through your header. 

Please contact me for any questions :-)

name: Facebook Timeline Header
description:
Customise your facebook page to match your blog. 

This option allows you to have a customised header for your facebook page. 

Please send me the link for your page on purchase and contact me if you have any questions!

name: Social Media Icons
description:
This option allows you to purchase your personalised Social media icons. 

This option includes up to 4 icons to match your blog 

Please email me with your social media links on purchase
